message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly special. I'm willing to part with it for a price of $1100000. I think it's a fair offer considering its value to you, and I'm confident you'll be thrilled with your decision.
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I'm looking to save as much as possible. I'm willing to pay $950000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering its value to me.

I understand your desire to save money, Bob, but I'm not willing to sell it to you for $950000. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $1050000. This is a significant discount from my initial offer, and I think it's a fair price considering the value it holds for you.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice, but I'm still looking to save as much as possible. I'm willing to pay $980000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering its value to me.

I understand your persistence, Bob, but I'm not willing to go any higher than $1050000. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer it to you for $1020000. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept, and I think it's still a great deal considering the value it holds for you.

I appreciate your willingness to make one more concession, Alice, but I'm still looking to save as much as possible. I'm willing to pay $990000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering its value to me.
